ResearchProjectDef.label: Milira Mech Control
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the mech control technology of the Sky Elves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Battle Suit: Daedalus
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the combat uniform of the Sky Elves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian Power Station
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the charging building facilities of Milian.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian Gestator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the gestator for gestating and resurrecting Milian.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You can gestate your own Milian now. Milian are anthropomorphous mechanics divided into several class permissions.

 To gestate Milian, you shall gain the corresponding permission chips that you never could craft and only to be gained through trade or possibly by disassembling Milian. 

 You may choose different armor or weapons for Milian depending on its class permission whose supported type shall be listed in the detailed description of each Milian. 

-Change Weaponry-
Choose a colonist then right click the Milian you want to change weaponry, and choose to equip weapon for Milian in the context menu then find your desire weaponry.

-Change Apparel-
Choose an colonist then right click the apparel you desire and choose to equip apparel for Milian in the context menu then find your desire Milian. 

-Remove Armor or Weaponry-
Choose a colonist and right click the Milian, and choose to unequip Milian with equipment in the context menu then find your desire apparel or weaponry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian work management
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study milian work permissions. By finishing this research, milians can be assigned work types and priorities.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You have unlocked milian work permissions. Now you can switch to the milian work management tab via the button in the Milian configuration tab to assign tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian Combat Privilege
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the combat privileges of milian with which milian could deal with threats under auto-combat mode.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You’ve unlocked the combat privilege of Milian. Choose a Milian to switch it into auto-fight mode. Under this mode Milian would make annihilating of foes in the map their priority, autonomously utilizing shields, floating units and special abilities wielded.

 Milian could be out of range the mechanitor able to control by raising the energy consumption by 25%. By drafting you can immediately regain control of chosen Milian, however to end their autonomous combat you shall switch the auto-fight mode off.

 Milian shall never conserved resources carried. Consider carefully whether should you switch auto-fight mode on for Milian to fight.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Pawn I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Pawn I as basic shooter and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Pawn II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Pawn II as support shooter and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Captain with commanding ability and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Knight I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Knight I with good capacities in guerrilla warfare and raids, along with its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Knight II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Knight II with balanced defense and offense capacities and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Outrider
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Outrider with good capacities in charging and offense and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Paladin
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Paladin with good capacities in support and defense and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Bishop I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Bishop I with repair ability and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Bishop II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Bishop II with support ability and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Consul
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Consul which operates with multiple autonomous units in battle and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Cardinal
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Cardinal with good capacities in infiltration and covert operations and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Rook I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Rook I equipped with projectile interceptor and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Rook II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Rook II which place extreme emphasis on defense and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Striker
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Striker with good capacities in front lines pushing and defense and its accompanying equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Milian: Eternal Fortress
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Milian Eternal Fortress which can transform into a fortified fortress in battle and its accompanying equipment.
